title: Männliflue
text: The Männliflue is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, located near <a href="Adelboden">Adelboden</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>, A state of Switzerland. It lies between the valleys of <a href="Diemtigtal">Diemtigen</a> and Adelboden.
